Changelog

------------------

- Plone 5.1 compatibility [Nachtalb]


1.0.1 (2018-10-23)
------------------

- Title must be set [Nachtalb]
- Add possibility to just add an image instead of having to add text [Nachtalb]


1.0.0 (2018-10-22)
------------------

- Initial implementation.
